ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: SOLAR is the standard software program to perform linkage and association mappings of the quantitative trait loci (QTLs) in pedigrees of arbitrary size and complexity. This package allows the user to exploit the variance component methods implemented in SOLAR. It automates such routine operations as formatting pedigree and phenotype data. It also parses the model output and contains summary and plotting functions for exploration of the results. In addition, solarius enables parallel computing of the linkage and association analyses, that makes the calculation of genome-wide scans more efficient. See <http

SOLAR is the standard software program to perform linkage and association mappings of the quantitative trait loci (QTLs) in pedigrees of arbitrary size and complexity. This package allows the user to exploit the variance component methods implemented in SOLAR. It automates such routine operations as formatting pedigree and phenotype data. It also parses the model output and contains summary and plotting functions for exploration of the results. In addition, solarius enables parallel computing of the linkage and association analyses, that makes the calculation of genome-wide scans more efficient. See <http

name: r-solarius
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '0.3.0.2' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-solarius
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/solarius_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/solarius/solarius_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 683844028170f3311a26ddb0ef7bb2b0ee5725868e12ea3dd43d20dc6d31879d

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1006
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-data.table
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-plyr >=1.8.1
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-data.table
    - r-ggplot2
    - r-plyr >=1.8.1

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('solarius')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('solarius')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/solarius/index.html
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  summary: SOLAR is the standard software program to perform linkage and association mappings
    of the quantitative trait loci (QTLs) in pedigrees of arbitrary size and complexity.
    This package allows the user to exploit the variance component methods implemented
    in SOLAR. It automates such routine operations as formatting pedigree and phenotype
    data. It also parses the model output and contains summary and plotting functions
    for exploration of the results. In addition, solarius enables parallel computing
    of the linkage and association analyses, that makes the calculation of genome-wide
    scans more efficient. See <http
  license_family: GPL3
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-3'

extra:
   recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - MathiasHaudgaard
    - FrodePedersen
    - ArneKr
